Best wishes to all of you and thanks again!!

The radiologist gave me more lidocaine, but by then, I almost fainted, literally. And my breast was still in the mammogram machine with needle injected. So thankful i stayed conscious so they could finish it. They laid me down as soon as they finished which restored the blood flow to my head. And gave me juice. Once home I went to bed and iced the breast every 30 min. I have architectural distortion. They got 8 tissue samples. Said I'd have results in 2 to 4 days. I'm terrified and my gut tells me this is just the beginning rather than the end. I'm praying that I'm wrong. In scared I don't have the strength to face bad news.
